author: werken
msg: Plugins go looking for plugin.properties now, instead of default.properties

author: plynch
msg: Here is a j2ee plug-in patch that should:
-ensure appserver targets Ant 1.4 compatibility by adding a custom Ant task that checks if a server is started
-correct a bug where $plugin was being used but alas $plugin is no longer....
-correct a bug where multiple properties were being tested incorrectly for
Hope to eventually move some of the heavier Ant grunt work into some java
classes but this at least makes sure we are backwards compatible...

author: jvanzyl
msg: Moving checkstyle logic into a plugin of its own.
